entry.title: Introduction to kefir
entry.content: Pretty cool stuff! Check out the Mason Jar to brew your own. Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: Pretty cool stuff! Check out the Mason Jar to brew your own. Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
